notifications.title: Thanks for your application
notifications.message:
We’ve received your application.
We’ll let you know if we need anything else.

notifications.title: Awaiting documentation upload
notifications.message: Your application is with us, and we’re waiting for you to send us some documents.

notifications.title: Getting to know you
notifications.message:
We’re looking through your documents now to get to know you a bit better.
If we think you’re a good fit, we’ll be in touch with your next steps soon.

notifications.title: Salary expectation
notifications.message:
Hi candidate XX111,
It was great to speak to you earlier today!
I am missing your salary expectation. 
Whenever you have the time, could you please provide that information via Chat?

notifications.title: You have been shortlisted!
notifications.message:
Congratulations! You’ve been shortlisted.
We’ll invite you to an interview soon.
In the meantime, go to the quick links below to help you prepare,
or request an adjustment if you need one.

notifications.title: Interview adjustment
notifications.message:
Hello, candidate XX111.
I wanted to inform you that your request for text size adjustment in the visual aid has been approved. 
Could you provide us with an approximate range of pixel fonts that you would find comfortable?
